description.value: The Ork now also gains the Benefits of Mob Rule (+10 to Resist effects of Fear and Pinning) for every Two Non-Orks that do not have the Machine Trait, are not Wild Animals, and are not Lesser Greenskins (Gretchin/Squigs/Snotlings) within 10 Metres.

system.benefit: The Ork now also gains the Benefits of Mob Rule (+10 to Resist effects of Fear and Pinning) for every Two Non-Orks that do not have the Machine Trait, are not Wild Animals, and are not Lesser Greenskins (Gretchin/Squigs/Snotlings) within 10 Metres.
